short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Innovative Site blocker with Pomodoro, Schedule, Calendar, Time limits, Custom rules, Time Insight, and much more features...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚫 Site Blocker & Productivity Extension – Stay Focused and Achieve More 🕝

Use customizable rules to block distracting websites and boost your productivity!

- Overcome procrastination and take control of your time.
- Block websites by Title, URL, or even specific YouTube channels.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

📛 Customizable Blocking Rules:

     💢 Permanent Blocks – Keep distractions away for good.
     🕐 Schedule – Set weekly time blocks.
     ⏱️ Time Limits – Control daily access to websites.
     ⭐️ Motivational Challenges – Stay commited.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

👀 Key Features:

    🍅 Pomodoro Timer – Work in focused intervals for peak productivity.
    🕒 Time Insights – Analyze your online activity and improve focus.
    ⚕️ Safe Browsing – Filter content through secure search engines.
    📆 Google Calendar Integration – Sync with your calendar to time block sessions.
    🗃️ Anki Integration – Unlock blocked sites by completing Anki cards.

     …and more!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🚫 Actions When a Rule is Triggered:
  You decide how to handle distractions!

    🟡 Redirect to a URL of your choice.
    🔵 Redirect to a customizable block page.
    🟢 Get motivated with a dedicated motivational page.
    🟤 Create custom messages or tasks to view before continuing.
    🟣 Annoying access: Solve simple math to unlock the site.
    🗃️ Anki: Finish flashcards to gain access.
